item.description:
@ipwnunoobs wrote:

Base: PI - > Erased Pkz Source
Compiling Errors: None

Pictures - > What the problem is:

Thats annoying thing over there wonâ€™t act as a goddamn timer! It will not even set the summonTime to my desired time. Oh yeah BTW that 60 is now a 0

Heres my code in client.java:

	public void summonTime(int npcId) {
	if(npcId == 6823) {
		summonTime = 1800;
	}
	if(summonTime > 0)
	summonTime -= 1; //Then take away one from the number.
	}
